stheno.kernel module¶

class stheno.kernel.Kernel[source]¶

Bases: stheno.function_field.Function, plum.resolvable.Referentiable

Kernel function.

Kernels can be added and multiplied.

elwise = <function <function Kernel.elwise> with 5 method(s)>[source]¶
length_scale¶

Approximation of the length scale of the kernel.

period¶

Period of the kernel.

periodic(period=1)[source]¶

Map to a periodic space.

Parameters

period (tensor, optional) – Period. Defaults to 1.

Returns

Periodic version of the kernel.

Return type

kernel.Kernel

stationary¶

Stationarity of the kernel.

var¶

Variance of the kernel.

class stheno.kernel.RQ(alpha)[source]¶

Bases: stheno.kernel.Kernel, plum.resolvable.Referentiable

Rational quadratic kernel.

Parameters

alpha (scalar) – Shape of the prior over length scales. Determines the weight of the tails of the kernel. Must be positive.

class stheno.kernel.FixedDelta(noises)[source]¶

Bases: stheno.kernel.Kernel, plum.resolvable.Referentiable

Kronecker delta kernel that produces a diagonal matrix with given noises if and only if the inputs are identical and of the right shape.

class stheno.kernel.DecayingKernel(alpha, beta)[source]¶

Bases: stheno.kernel.Kernel, plum.resolvable.Referentiable

Decaying kernel.

Parameters

  • alpha (tensor) – Shape of the gamma distribution governing the distribution of decaying exponentials.

  • beta (tensor) – Rate of the gamma distribution governing the distribution of decaying exponentials.
